document.docAuthor: Leschen, Richard A. B. & Newton, Alfred F.
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist and type designations of New Zealand Aleocharinae (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist and type designations of New Zealand Aleocharinae (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Dasytricheta Bernhauer 1943 : 171
. Type species:
Dasytricheta spectabilis Bernhauer, 1943
, by monotypy.

= Pyromecroma
Cameron 1945 : 165 . Type species:
Myrmecopora funesta Broun, 1912
(as Bernhauer (in error)), by original designation.

Notes: The genus
Dasytricheta
is endemic to New Zealand , with 11 valid species according to the recent revision of Pa≈õnik ( 2007 b).

Myrmecopora funesta Broun 1912 : 397
. Type locality: Broken River, Canterbury. Type depository: BMNH LT , 1 PLT (designated below) [as HT in error, Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 819 ]. Note: comb. nov. ex
Pyromecroma , Pa≈õnik ( 2007 b: 819 )
. Distribution: New Zealand (MC,OL,WD).

Remarks. Broun did not indicate the number of specimens on which he based this species. Two syntypes are present in the BMNH ; one of these was incorrectly labelled as the holotype by Pa≈õnik ( 2007 b). In order to stabilize this name a lectotype and one paralectotype are here designated for these specimens of
Myrmecopora funesta .
Type material examined.
Lectotype ( BMNH ): card-mounted (terminalia on acetate card), ‚Äú Type [round label with red border] // 3187 . [in Broun‚Äôs hand] // Broken Riv Canterbury [in Broun‚Äôs hand, label cut at left margin] // New Zealand . [red underline] Broun Coll. Brit. Mus. 1922 - 482 . // Myrmecopora funesta . ‚ôÄ. [in Broun‚Äôs hand] // HOLOTYPE Myrmecopora funesta Broun des. G. Pa≈õnik 2005 [in Pa≈õnik‚Äôs hand, partly printed on red label with black border] // Dasytrcheta fenestra (Broun) [in Pa≈õnik‚Äôs hand] det G. Pa≈õnik 2005 ‚Äù. Paralectotype ( BMNH ): cardmounted (dorsally), ‚Äú Type [round label with red border] // 3187 . [in Broun‚Äôs hand] // Broken River. [in Broun‚Äôs hand] // New Zealand . [red underline] Broun Coll. Brit. Mus. 1922 - 482 . // Myrmecopora funesta . [in Broun‚Äôs hand] // Dasytricheta funestra (Broun) [in Pa≈õnik‚Äôs hand] det G. Pa≈õnik 2005 ‚Äù.

Dasytricheta haastiana Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 821
. Type locality: New Zealand , WD: 20 km E Haast, banks of Haast river,
80m .
Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ. Distribution: New Zealand (WD).

Dasytricheta hookeriana Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 820
. Type locality: New Zealand , OL: Queenstown, Arthurs Point, banks of Shotover River. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 21 PT ; ISZP 1 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (OL).

Dasytricheta intermedia Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 819
. Type locality: New Zealand , OL: Queenstown, Arthurs Point, banks of Shotover River. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 42 PT ; ISZP 1 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (OL).

Dasytricheta kapuniana Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 822
. Type locality: New Zealand , TK: Egmont National Park, Kapuni valley, 1030-1250m . Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 11 PT ; ISZP 1 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (TK; MK,WD).

Dasytricheta mahitahiana Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 822
. Type locality: New Zealand , WD: Mahitahi River, Scenic Reserve. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ. Distribution: New Zealand (WD).

Dasytricheta periana Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 823
. Type locality: New Zealand , ND: Honeymoon Valley, Peria Stream,
60m .
Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 4 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (ND,WA).

Dasytricheta shotoveriana Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 819
. Type locality: New Zealand , OL: Queenstown, Arthurs Point, banks of Shotover River. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 34 PT ; ISZP 1 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (OL).

Dasytricheta spectabilis Bernhauer 1943 : 172
. Type locality: Kakaia [sic; as Rakaia in Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 818 ]. Type depository: BMNH LT , FMNH 1 PLT (designated below)[as HT in error, Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 818 ]. Note: as synonym of
funesta
in NZAC , but as valid species, Pa≈õnik ( 2007 b). Distribution: New Zealand (MC).
Remarks. Bernhauer described this species from ‚ÄúKakaia‚Äù [error for Rakaia], collected by Walker, but did not
indicate the number of specimens he had seen. Pa≈õnik ( 2007 b) indicated having seen a ‚Äú holotype ‚Äù female from
FMNH and male non-type specimen from BMNH , but both of these specimens have Bernhauer type labels and the
same locality data (Rakaia) and collector (J. Walker), and should be considered syntypes . In order to stabilize this

name a lectotype ( BMNH ) and one paralectotype ( FMNH ) are here designated for specimens of
Dasytricheta

Type material examined.
Lectotype ( BMNH ): card-mounted (left antennal club detached, terminalia and
mouthparts on acetate card), ‚Äú Type [round label with red border] // Rakaia N. Zealand JJWalker [in Champion‚Äôs?

hand] // Dasytricheta spectabilis Brh. Typ [in Bernhauer‚Äôs hand] M. Bernhauer det. // nov. gen. Dasytricheta Brh.M. Bernhauer det. Typ. [in Bernhauer‚Äôs hand, partly printed] // G. C. Champion Coll. B.M. 1927 - 409 . // Dasytricheta spectabilis Br. [in Pa≈õnik‚Äôs hand] det G. Pa≈õnik 2005 ‚Äù. Paralectotype ( FMNH ): same locality and collector according to Pa≈õnik ( 2007 b) [Note: this specimen could not be located in FMNH by AFN in
February 2015
to confirm data about the specimen].

Dasytricheta testacea Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 820
. Type locality: New Zealand , OL: Queenstown, Arthurs Point, banks of Shotover River. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 9 PT ; ISZP 1 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (OL).

Dasytricheta waihoana Pa≈õnik 2007 b: 822
. Type locality: New Zealand , WD: Waiho River valley, ca.
200m .
Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ. Distribution: New Zealand (WD).

Ecomorypora Cameron 1945 : 165
. Type species:
Myrmecopora granulata Broun, 1912
, by original designation. Notes: The genus
Ecomorypora
is endemic to New Zealand , with four valid species according to the recent revision of Pa≈õnik ( 2007 a).

Ecomorypora densepunctata Pa≈õnik 2007 a: 1104
. Type locality: New Zealand , AK: Orere stream banks. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 2 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (AK; MK, OL).

Myrmecopora granulata Broun 1912 : 398
. Type locality: Broken River. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ. Note: redescription, Pa≈õnik 2007 a: 1102 (
R 29147
). Distribution: New Zealand (MC). Remarks. The holotype was confirmed by a label attached to the specimen by G. Pa≈õnik.

Ecomorypora longelytrata Pa≈õnik 2007 a: 1105
. Type locality: New Zealand , AK: Orere stream banks. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 2 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (AK; MC).

Ecomorypora pseudogranulata Pa≈õnik 2007 a: 1103
. Type locality: New Zealand , MK: Hooker Valley, 3-5 km N Hermitage,
750‚Äì 830m
. Type depository: BMNH HT ‚ôÇ, 8 PT . Distribution: New Zealand (TK; MK, SL, WD).
